chapter.text: Zhongren a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, fuhuo shi di dizhen, que shi yi jian dashi

Zai na ri, nimen kanjian dizhen xia mei ge rumu dou bei xia de wangjile ying'er, xia de mei ge yunfu dou yao liuchan; ni ba renmen kan cheng zui han, qishi tamen bingfei shi zui han, er shi yin wei zhenzhu de xingfa shi yanjun de
Youren wuzhi di jinxing guanyu zhenzhu de zhenglun, bingqie shuncong panni de emo
Fan jiejiao emo zhe, emo biding shi ta mi wu, biding ba ta yinru huo yu de xingfa, zhe shi gei zhudingle de

Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yiyu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige ding qi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe) yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu
Zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu shi zhen zai, ta neng shi sizhe fusheng, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Fuhuo que shi yao lailin de, hao wuyi yi, zhenzhuyao shi fenmu li de ren fuhuo qilai
Youren zhenglun zhenzhu, dan ta ji wu zhishi, you wu zhidao, qie wu canlan de jingdian
Ta aoman de zou kai, yibian you ren panli zhenzhu de dadao. Ta zai jinshi yao shou lingru, fuhuo ri wo yao shi ta changshi shaozhuo de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei ni suo fan de zuixing, ye yin wei zhenzhu jue bushi kuidai zhong puren de
Youren zai bianyuan shang chongbai zhenzhu, ruo huo fuli, ta jiu anran xiangshou; ruo zao huohai, ta jiu qingshuai beipan. Ta jiang sangshi jinshi he houshi, zhe shi mingxian de kuisun
Ta she zhenzhu er qidao na duiyu ta ji wu huo you wu fu de dongxi, zhe shi bu jin qingli de mi wu
Ta qidao na you jin huo er wu yuan fu de dongxi, ta de yuanzhu zhe zhen elie! Zuo ta de tongban de zhen elie
zhenzhu biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Zhenzhu que shi weisuoyuwei de
Shei caixiang zhenzhu zai jinshi he houshi jue bu xiangzhu ta, jiao shei xuanliang zi jin, jiao ta kan ta de jice neng fou jiechu ta de fennu
wo zheyang jiang shi “gulanjing”, zuowei mingxian de jixiang, zhenzhu que shi yindao tasuo yu yindao de
Xindao zhe, youtai jiaotu, bai xing jiaotu, jidu jiaotu, baihuojiao tu, yiji yi wu pei zhu zhe, fuhuo ri zhenzhu biding yao wei tamen panjue, zhenzhu que shi wanwu de jianzheng

Ni nandao bu zhidao ma? Zai tianshang de he zai dishang de, yu ri yue qunxing, shanyue shumu, shengchu he xuduo ren, dou fucong zhenzhu, you xuduo ren dang shou xingfa. Zhenzhu lingru shei, shei bu shou ren zunjing. Zhenzhu que shi weisuoyuwei de.※§
Zhe liang pai shi xiang zheng de, tamen jinxing guanyu tamen de zhu de zhenglun. Buxin zhe yijing you wei tamen er cai zhi de huo yile, feishui jiang qingzhu zai tamen de tou shang
tamen de neizang he pifu jiang bei feishui suo ronghua
tamen jiang xiangshou tie bian de chouda
Tamen mei yin choumen er tao chu huo yu, dou bei lan huiqu. Nimen changshi shaozhuo de xingfa ba
Zhen zhu biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan, tamen zai qizhong de xiangyong jin zhuo he zhenzhu zuo zhuangshi, tamen de yifu shi sichou de
Tamen ceng meng yindao, guchang shuo youmei de yuyan; tamen ceng meng yindao, gu zunxun shou zansong zhe de dadao

Bu xindao erqie fang'ai zhu dao, bingqie fang'ai wo shi zhongren ──dingju de he youmu de ──gongtong zunjing jin si zhe,(wo jiang shi ta shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa); shei yin bu yi er yu zai jin sizhong weibei zhengdao, wo jiang shi shei shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa
Dangshi wo ceng wei yi bo la xin zhiding tian fang di dizhi,(wo shuo):“Ni buyao yi renhe wu pei wo, ni yingdang wei huanxing zhe, lizheng zhe, jugong zhe he koutou zhe, dasao wo de fangwu
Ni yingdang zai zhongren zhong xuangao chaojin, tamen jiu cong yuandao huo tubu huo chengzhe shou tuo, dao ni zheli lai

yibian tamen jianzheng tamen suoyou de xuduo liyi, bingqie zai guiding de ruogan rinei, jinian zhenzhu zhi ming er tuzai ta ci gei tamen de shengchu.” Nimen keyi chi naxie shengchu de rou, bingqie yingdang yong lai kuandai kunku de he pinqiong de ren
Ranhou jiao tamen dichu tamen de wugou, jiao tamen luxing tamen de shiyuan, jiao tamen weirao na jian gu fang er huanxing

Shiqing jiushi zheyang de, shei zunzhong zhenzhu de jielu, zai zhu di nali duiyu shei shi geng hao de. Yiqie shengchu dui nimen dou shi hefa de, dui nimen yi xuanbu jin jie zhe chuwai. Gu nimen yingdang bi kai wuhui ji ouxiang, yingdang yuanli wangyu
tongshi wei zhenzhu er xinfeng zhengjiao, bu yi wu pei ta. Shei yi wu pei zhenzhu, shei ru cong tiankong zhuiluo, er bei qun niao duo zou, huo bei dafeng saodang dao yuanfang
Shiqing jiushi zheyang de, shei zunjing zhenzhu de biaozhi, na shi xinzhong de qiancheng fachu de
Shengchu duiyu nimen, you ruogan liyi, zhiyu yige dingqi, ranhou (tuzai tamen zuo gong xian) de hefa difang yinggai shi gu fang de fujin

Wo wei mei ge minzu zhiding yi zhong gong xian de yishi, yibian tamen jinian zhenzhu zhi ming er tuzai ta suo ci tamen de shengchu. Nimen de shenming shi du yi de shenming, gu nimen yingdang zhi guishun ta. Ni yingdang yi xixun chuan shi qiangong zhe
Dang jinian zhenzhu de shihou, zhongxin gandao kongju zhe——gandao zhanli zhe, renshou kunan zhe, jin shou bai gong zhe, fen she wo suo ci zhi wu zhe

wo wei nimen yi luotuo wei zhenzhu de biaozhi, tamen duiyu nimen you xuduo yichu; tamen pailie chengxing de shihou, nimen yingdang wei tuzai tamen er jinian zhenzhu zhi ming; dang tamen ce wo zai dishang de shihou, nimen keyi chi tamen de rou, bing yingdang yong lai kuandai zhizu de pinmin he qitao de pinmin. Wo wei nimen zheyang zhifu tamen, yibian nimen ganxie

Tamen de rou he xue, dou buneng dadao zhenzhu, dan nimen de qiancheng, neng dadao ta. Ta wei nimen zheyang zhifu tamen, yibian nimen wei zhenzhu dui nimen de yindao er zunchong ta. Ni yingdang xiang xingshan zhe baoxi.§
Zhenzhu biding yao baohu xindao zhe, zhenzhu que shi bu xi'ai mei ge wang'enfuyi de panni zhe de
Bei jingong zhe, yi huode fankang de xuke, yinwei tamen shi shou yapo de. Zhenzhu duiyu yuanzhu tamen, que shi quanneng de

Tamen bei wuli de zhu chu guxiang, zhi yin tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu shi zhenzhu.” Yao bushi zhenzhu yi shiren huxiang dikang, name xuduo xiudaoyuan, libaitang, youtai huitang, qingzhensi ──qizhong chang youren jinian zhenzhu zhi ming de jianzhu wu ──biding bei ren pohuaile. Fan fuzhu zhenzhu de dadao zhe, zhenzhu biding fuzhu ta; zhenzhu que shi zhi qiang de, que shi wanneng de
Ruguo wo shi naxie ren zai dimian shang deshi, tamen jiang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quan shan jie e. Wanshi de jieju zhi guizhenzhu
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian, fouren shizhe de yi you nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, sai mo de ren
yi bo la xin de zongzu, lu te de zongzu
mai de yan ren; mu sa ye ceng bei fourenguo. Wo yourong bu xindao zhe, suihou wo chengzhile tamen; wo de qianze shi zenyang de ne
You xuduo chengshi jumin bu yi, er wo huimie tamen, dishang wuding shang cun, bingqie you ruogan bei yiqi de shuijing he bei jiancheng de dasha
Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, yin'er youxin keyi liaojie, huozhe you er keyi tingwen ma? Yinwei rouyan bu mang, xiongzhong de xinyan que mangle
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa. Zhen zhu jue bu shuangyue. Zai ni de zhu nali de yi ri, qiaru nimen suo shu de yiqian nian
You xuduo chengshi, jumin bu yi, er wo yourong tamen, suihou, wo chengzhi tamen, wo shi weiyi de guisu
Ni shuo: “Zhongren a! Wo dui nimen zhishi yige zhishuang de jinggao zhe.”
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, de meng she you, de xiang youhou de jiyang
yi zunao de taidu nuli fandui wo de jixiang zhe, shi huo yu de jumin

Zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de shizhe he xianzhi, meiyouyige bushi zheyang de: Dang ta yuanwang de shihou, emo duiyu ta de yuanwang, you yi zhong jianyi, dan zhenzhu pochu emo de jianyi, ranhou, zhenzhu shi ziji de jixiang chengwei jian que de. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
(Ta zheyang zuo) yibian ta yi emo jianyi de shi kaoyan you xinbing de ren he xin ying de ren. Bu yi zhe bi xianyu changyuan de fenlie zhi zhong
(Ta zheyang zuo) yibian you xueshi zhe zhidao na shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, yinwei tamen xinyang ta, er tamen dui ta xinhuai qianxun. Zhenzhu biding yao ba xindao zhe yin shang zhenglu
Bu xindao zhe duiyu ta rengran zai youyu zhi zhong, zhidao fuhuo shike huran jianglin tamen, huo pohuai ri de xingfa lailin tamen
Zai na ri, zhuquan zhishi zhenzhu de. Ta yao panjue tamen. Xindao erqie xingshan, jiang zai ji leyuan zhong
bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang zhe, jiang shou lingru de xingfa
Wei zhenzhu zhidao er qianju, ranhou bei shahai huo binggu zhe, zhenzhu bi shangci tamen jiamei de jiyang; zhenzhu que shi zui shanyu jiyang de
Ta bi shi tamen jinru tamen suo xiyue di difang; zhenzhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi rongren de.§
Shiqing jiushi zheyang de. Fan yi yuan baoyuan, ranhou bei ren nuedai zhe, zhenzhu bi yuanzhu ta. Zhenzhu que shi zhi shu de, que shi zhi she de
Zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; you yin wei zhenzhu shi quan cong de, shi quan ming de
Zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu shi zhenshi de, tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de (ouxiang) shi xuwang de; you yin wei zhenzhu shi zhizun de, shi zhi da de
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, dimian jiu bian cheng cangcui de. Zhenzhu que shiren'ai de, que shi che zhi de
Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de

Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu wei nimen zhifu da dishang suoyou de shiwu, yiji feng ta de ming er zai haishang hangxing de chuanbo, ta weichizhe tian yimian zhuiluo zai dishang, chufei huode ta xuke. Zhenzhu duiyu shiren que shi zhi ai de, que shi zhi ci de
Ta shi nimen sheng, ranhou shi nimen si, ranhou shi nimen fuhuo; ren que shi gu en de

Wo wei mei ge minzu zhiding yi zhong gong xian yishi, rang tamen you suo zunxun, jue bushi rang tamen wei zhe shi yu ni zhenglun. Ni yingdang zhaohuan zhongren lai chongbai ni de zhu, ni que shi zai zheng lushang de
Ruguo tamen yu ni zhenglun, ni yingdang shuo:“Zhenzhu shi zhidao nimen de xingwei de
Fuhuo ri, zhenzhu jiang panjue nimen suo zhenglun de shifei.”
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu zhidao tiandi wanwu, zhe que shi zai yi ben tian jing li de. Zhe duiyu zhenzhu que shi rongyi de
Tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai zhenzhu suo wei zhengshi de, ye fei tamen suo zhidao de ouxiang; bu yi de ren jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe

Dang bieren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, ni kanjian bu xindao zhe de lian shang you bu yuezhi se; tamen jihu yao xiji dui tamen xuandu wo de jixiang zhe. Ni shuo:“Wo gaosu nimen bi zhege geng elie de hao ma? Na jiushi huo yu. Zhenzhu yi huo yu yingxu bu xindao zhe, na guisu zhen elie

zhongren a! You yige piyu yi pi fa chu, nimen qingting ba! Nimen she zhenzhu er qidao de (ouxiang) sui quncequnli, jue buneng chuangzao yi zhi cangying; ruguo cangying cong tamen de shenshang duoqu yidian dongxi, tamen ye buneng ba na dian dongxi qiang huilai. Qidao zhe he bei qidao zhe, dou shi nuoruo de!”
Tamen meiyou zhenshi di zunjing zhenzhu. Zhenzhu que shi zhi qiang de, que shi wanneng de
Zhenzhu cong tianshen zhong, yu renlei zhong jianxuan ruogan shizhe, zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Ta zhi dao tamen yi zuo de he jiang zuo de shiqing, wanshi zhi guizhenzhu
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jugong, yingdang koutou, yingdang chongbai nimen de zhu, yingdang li xingshan gong, yibian nimen chenggong.※

Nimen yingdang wei zhenzhu er zhenshi di fendou. Ta jianxuan nimen, guanyu zongjiao de shi, ta weiceng yi renhe fannan wei nimen de yiwu, nimen yingdang zunxun nimen de zuxian yi bo la xin de zongjiao, yiqian zhenzhu cheng nimen wei musilin, zai zhe bu jingdian li ta ye cheng nimen wei musilin, yibian shizhe wei nimen zuozheng, er nimen wei shi ren zuozheng. Nimen dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, xintuo zhen zhu; ta shi nimen de zhuzai, zhuzai zhen hao! Zhu zhe zhen hao
